remarks: A variant of ~ ax6 .  Axiom scheme C10' in [Megill] p. 448 (p. 16 of the preprint). This axiom is obsolete and should no longer be used.  It is proved above as theorem ~ axc10 .  (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-1993.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: ax-c10 $p |- ( A. x ( x = y -> A. x ph ) -> ph ) $.
